Package org.CAP5400.Toolbox

Class Toolbox

java.lang.Object
org.CAP5400.Toolbox.Toolbox
public class Toolbox extends Object
This class contains a set of static methods that can be used to perform operations on a region of interest (ROI) within an image.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Reubin George
See Also:
  • ROI

  • Constructor Details

    • Toolbox

      public Toolbox()

  • Method Details

    • addGrey

      public static void addGrey(ROI region, int value) throws Exception

      This method increases the intensity of all pixels in the given region of interest.

      NOTE: This method works only on grayscale images.

      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      value - the value by which the pixel intensity will be increased.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • addBrightness

      public static void addBrightness(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=-50L, to=50L) int value) throws Exception

      This method increase the intensity of all pixel in all available channels in the given region of interest.

      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      value - the value by which the pixel intensity will be increased. The value can be in range (-50 to 50).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • decreaseBrightness

      public static void decreaseBrightness(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int threshold, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int value) throws Exception
      This method takes a region of interest within an image and adjusts the brightness of pixels based on a given threshold.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      threshold - The threshold intensity value. If the pixel intensity in the source image is below this threshold, brightness will be decreased.
      value - The value by which to decrease the brightness of pixels below the threshold.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • binarize

      public static void binarize(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int threshold) throws Exception
      This method binarizes a region of interest (ROI) within an image based on a specified threshold.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      threshold - The intensity threshold for binarization (0 to 255).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • scale

      public static void scale(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.CAP5400.Misc.FloatRange(from=1.0f, to=2.0f) float ratio) throws Exception
      This method scales a region of interest (ROI) within an image by a specified ratio.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      ratio - The scaling ratio (1.0 to 2.0).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • rotate

      public static void rotate(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, int angle) throws Exception
      This method rotates a region of interest (ROI) within an image by a specified angle.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      angle - The angle by which to rotate the region (must be a positive multiple of 90 degrees).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • histogramEqualizationAll

      public static void histogramEqualizationAll(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotEmpty @NotNull @NotBlank @NotEmpty String colorSpace) throws Exception
      This method applies histogram equalization to a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The equalization is performed separately on each channel for color images.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorSpace - The color space in which to perform histogram equalization. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • histogramEqualization

      public static void histogramEqualization(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotEmpty @NotNull @NotBlank @NotEmpty String colorSpace, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channelIndex) throws Exception
      This method applies histogram equalization to a region of interest (ROI) within an image based on the specified color space.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorSpace - The color space in which to perform histogram equalization. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      channelIndex - The index of the channel to equalize.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • thresholdHistogramEqualization

      public static void thresholdHistogramEqualization(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int threshold, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channelIndex) throws Exception
      This method applies threshold histogram equalization to a specified channel within a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The method enhances the histogram of dark pixels (below the threshold) in the specified channel.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      threshold - The intensity threshold below which pixel values are considered dark.
      channelIndex - The index of the channel to perform threshold histogram equalization.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • histogramStretch

      public static void histogramStretch(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int minStretch, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int maxStretch, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channel) throws Exception
      This method applies histogram stretching to a specific channel within a region of interest (ROI). The stretched histogram is based on the specified minimum and maximum intensity values. The stretched values are applied to the pixels in the specified channel, and the resulting image is saved with an updated histogram.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      minStretch - The minimum intensity value for histogram stretching (0-255).
      maxStretch - The maximum intensity value for histogram stretching (0-255).
      channel - The channel for which the histogram stretching is applied (0-2).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • histogramStretchAll

      public static void histogramStretchAll(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int minStretch, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=255L) int maxStretch) throws Exception
      This method applies histogram stretching to all channels within a region of interest (ROI). The stretched histogram is based on the specified minimum and maximum intensity values. The stretched values are applied to each channel independently, and the resulting image is saved with updated histograms for all channels.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      minStretch - The minimum intensity value for histogram stretching (0-255).
      maxStretch - The maximum intensity value for histogram stretching (0-255).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • lowPassFilter

      public static void lowPassFilter(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String colorspace, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channel, @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int filterRadius) throws Exception
      This method applies a low-pass filter to a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The filter is applied to each channel independently for color images.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorspace - The color space in which to perform the low-pass filter. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      channel - The index of the channel to which the low-pass filter is applied.
      filterRadius - The radius of the low-pass filter.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • highPassFilter

      public static void highPassFilter(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String colorspace, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channel, @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int filterRadius) throws Exception
      This method applies a high-pass filter to a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The filter is applied to each channel independently for color images.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorspace - The color space in which to perform the high-pass filter. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      channel - The index of the channel to which the high-pass filter is applied.
      filterRadius - The radius of the high-pass filter.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • bandStopFilter

      public static void bandStopFilter(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String colorspace, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channel, @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int innerFilterRadius, @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int outerFilterRadius) throws Exception
      This method applies a band-pass filter to a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The filter is applied to each channel independently for color images.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorspace - The color space in which to perform the band-pass filter. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      channel - The index of the channel to which the band-pass filter is applied.
      innerFilterRadius - The radius of the inner band-pass filter.
      outerFilterRadius - The radius of the outer band-pass filter.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!

    • sharpenEdge

      public static void sharpenEdge(@NotNull @NotNull ROI region, @NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String colorspace, @org.checkerframework.common.value.qual.IntRange(from=0L, to=2L) int channel, @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int filterRadius, double sharpeningFactor) throws Exception
      This method sharpens the edges of a region of interest (ROI) within an image. The sharpening is performed independently on each channel for color images using an unsharp mask.
      Parameters:
      region - Region of interest on which this filter will be applied.
      colorspace - The color space in which to perform the sharpening. It can be either "RGB" or "HSV".
      channel - The index of the channel to which the sharpening is applied.
      filterRadius - The size of the filter used to perform the sharpening.
      sharpeningFactor - The sharpening factor (0.0 to 1.0).
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown error if any problems are detected!
